description: Kafka metrics depends on spring-kafka-metrics for consumers

panels.description: The time taken for a fetch request.
panels.title: fetch latency

panels.description: The time taken for a commit request
panels.title: commit latency

panels.description: The time taken for a group rejoin
panels.title: Join latency

panels.description: The average throttle time in ms
panels.title: Fetch throttle

panels.description: The time taken to receive a response to a heartbeat request
panels.title: Heartbeat

targets.legendFormat: The number of commit calls per second - {{client_id}}
The number of group joins per seconds - {{client_id}}

The number of heartbeats per second
 - {{client_id}}
The number of group syncs per second - {{client_id}}

panels.description: The number of partitions currently assigned to this consumer
panels.title: Partitions

panels.description: The total number of times the I/O layer checked for new I/O to perform

targets.legendFormat: I/O number checked for new I/O - {{client_id}}

panels.title: Total consumer requests

panels.description: The average number of records in each request for a topic
panels.title: Records request

panels.description: The average length of time the I/O thread spent waiting for a socket ready for reads or writes in nanoseconds.
panels.title: Avg time for waiting IO operations

panels.description: The average length of time for I/O per select call in nanoseconds.
panels.title: Avg time for IO

panels.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent doing I/O
panels.title: IO Ratio

panels.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent waiting
panels.title: io_wait_ratio

title: Kafka consumers statistic
